name: Inmige
imageAlt: The home page of the inmige app
description: Inmige is a decentralized image hosting and sharing service. Taking inspiration from imgur, the platform provides frictionless image and video sharing using the IPFS protocol to save media on a decentralized network. Post a meme and share it with the world!

name: Image To ASCII
imageAlt: The image to ascii website homepage
description: Image to ascii converters are common on the internet, but many of them lack customization and use confusing, text heavy interfaces. This app aims to provide an easy and highly customizeable ascii to image conversion experience.
technologies: Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript

name: Outrun Music Visualizer
imageAlt: A vaporwave sun surrounded by colored rectangles
description: This project is a vaporvave themed music visualizer. Lose yourself in a mesmerizing audiovisual experience. Upload a song and try it out.

name: Police Fatal Encounters
imageAlt: A red fish standing on a leg over a green background
description: There is no official, government collected national data on how many people are killed by U.S. police officers each year. The dataset used in this project was crowd sourced from news reports. While likely incomplete, this is the closest we have to accurate data. This project visualizes these numbers and tells the stories of the people behind this data.

name: Voice Activity Monitor
imageAlt: A red fish standing on a leg over a green background
description: This discord bot monitors voice activity to alert other users when someone has joined a voice channel to chat. It tracks activity data to generate charts to show who spends the most time in voice channels and what peak times of day are for your server.

name: Image Editor
imageAlt: The react image editor app's edit page
description: A compact and easy to use image editor built with React.js. Take it for a spin and make a meme with it.

name: Joust MP
imageAlt: The joust multiplayer website menu page
description: A multiplayer remix of the classic arcade game Joust from 1982. The server is written using flask-socketio.
technologies: Flask, Python, Socket IO, HTML, CSS, Javascript

name: HHSEasy Cal
description: A calendar and block schedule app I designed to help students at my highschool to better navigate an over complicated class block schedule.

name: Quarticolor
imageAlt: A red, blue, green, and yellow circle linked together
description: Quarticolor is a fast paced color sorting game created with spritekit and swift 3. Originally published to Apple's app store in December of 2018 it is, unfortunately, no longer avaliable.

name: Lawn Mower Man Mobile
imageAlt: A man riding a lawn mower
description: Lawn mower man is an idle game where the player mows lawns to earn money. The money can then be used to upgrade their lawn mower. Lawn mower man gained a cult following during its time on Apple's app store. Unfortunately the app is no longer avaliable.
